page.title: 02PETS
page.content: I have quite a few friends, most of them have a pet.{Alison}has a{mynah {bird}called Arthur. It lives on bananas, apple, pears and dried fruit. Its cage is 80cms long and 30cms wide.{Clare Bowerman}used to have a{ferret}called Donna, it lived in a cage approx. 1m long and 60cms wide. It lived on chicken livers, giblets and rabbits' guts. They also catch for themselves flies and insects.{Mark Whitely}has an old tortoise who is about 12 years old. She lives in the front garden or inside.{Christopher Broome}has an old tortoise who lives in the compost heap. A man up our road has 2{goats } called Bella and Starry. We often feed them when they go on holiday. {Helen {Tanswell}has 9{lizards.
